name: XTREME SUPER Maggio Flying Power Disc Sports TURBO
name_original: XTREME SUPER Maggio Flying Power Disc Sports TURBO
description:
Two radical Twins. Locked in an XTREME contest of champions. With only the gnarly whirlwind of a FLYING POWER DISC between them.

Will you side with good?

Or will you side with EVIL.

IN THE TURBO BATTLE FOR YOUR SUPER MIND.

Let the games begin!

XTREME MAGGIO FLYING POWER DISC SPORTS TURBO was handcrafted in ~9 hours, for Gamemaking Frenzy: Duplicade, with love, by:

M. James Short / @mjamesshort

David Aslan French / @TheDonquixotic / http://madjackalope.itch.io/
